page.content:
Pertemps Final Handicap Hurdle Race Card 2012

The Pertemps Final Handicap Hurdle is always a tough race for punters to pick over and with that in mind the full race card is a must before having a bet on the race on Day 3 of the Festival. The race card will be on offer to punters on the day of the race and will feature each of the field declared as well as their odds and form going into the Pertemps Handicap Hurdle Final on Thursday.

Pertemps Final Handicap Hurdle Race Card
